thread.title: Slow down to enjoy Ecuador

author: Paul Ybarbo
title: Slow down to enjoy Ecuador
text:

Paul Ybarbo, of San Francisco, at the base of Cotopaxi Volcano in...
Why I went: Wanted to celebrate an “insignificant” birthday in a country with beauty, culture, colonial architecture and hospitable people. There are great opportunities to see wildlife while mountain biking in remote areas. Paul Ybarbo, of San Francisco, at the base of Cotopaxi Volcano in the background.
